oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.binning

Interface BinningAlg

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HexBinningAlg, RectBinningAlg

    public interface BinningAlg
    Represents an algorithm to perform spatial binning.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BinningConfig getBinningConfig()
      Gets the binning configuration
      void getCell(double x, double y, int[] cell)
      Gets the row and column of the cell that contains the given point.
      void getCell(long cellId, int[] cell)
      Gets the row and column of the cell with the given id
      long getCellId(int[] cell)
      Gets the id of the cell represented by the given row and column
      void getCellMbr(int[] cell, double[] cellMbr)
      Gets the minimum bounding box of the given cell's row and column
      void getCellOrdinates(int[] cell, double[] cellOrds)
      Gets the ordinates of the given cell
      int getCellOrdinatesLength()
      Gets the number of ordinates that contains any cell created by this algorithm
      boolean isValidCell(int[] cell)
      Indicates whether a given cell is valid within the current binning configuration or not

    • Method Detail

      • getBinningConfig

        BinningConfig getBinningConfig()
        Gets the binning configuration
        Returns:
        a BinniningConfig instance

      • getCell

        void getCell(double x,
             double y,
             int[] cell)
        Gets the row and column of the cell that contains the given point.
        Parameters:
        x - The point`s x ordinate
        y - The point`s y ordinate
        cell - An output parameter which will hold the cell's row and column

      • getCell

        void getCell(long cellId,
             int[] cell)
        Gets the row and column of the cell with the given id
        Parameters:
        cellId - the cell id
        cell - An output parameter which will hold the cell's row and column

      • getCellId

        long getCellId(int[] cell)
        Gets the id of the cell represented by the given row and column
        Parameters:
        cell - a cell's row and column
        Returns:
        the cell id

      • getCellMbr

        void getCellMbr(int[] cell,
                double[] cellMbr)
        Gets the minimum bounding box of the given cell's row and column
        Parameters:
        cell - a cell's row and column
        cellMbr - An output parameter which will hold the cell's mbr

      • getCellOrdinates

        void getCellOrdinates(int[] cell,
                      double[] cellOrds)
        Gets the ordinates of the given cell
        Parameters:
        cell - a cell's row and column
        cellOrds - An output parameter which will hold the cell's ordinates

      • getCellOrdinatesLength

        int getCellOrdinatesLength()
        Gets the number of ordinates that contains any cell created by this algorithm
        Returns:
        the number of ordinates

      • isValidCell

        boolean isValidCell(int[] cell)
        Indicates whether a given cell is valid within the current binning configuration or not
        Parameters:
        cell - a cell's row and column
        Returns:
        true if the cell is valid
